input.description:
adapter name [Optional] The name of the adapter to use to handle the request.
Default value: VMwareInfrastructure

items The items XML used to perform "Update Cluster DRS Configuration" operation.
Value takes the form:
<items> <item> <parameters> <cluster-compute-resource></cluster-compute-resource> <spec> <drs-config> <enabled></enabled> <enable-vm-behavior-overrides></enable-vm-behavior-overrides> <default-vm-behavior></default-vm-behavior> </drs-config> <drs-vm-config-spec> <operation></operation> <info> <virtual-machine></virtual-machine> <enabled></enabled> <behavior></behavior> </info> </drs-vm-config-spec> <group-spec-list> <group-spec> <operation></operation> <!-- add/edit--> <info type="ClusterHostGroup"> <name></name> <host-system-list> <host-system></host-system> </host-system-list> </info> </group-spec> <group-spec> <operation></operation> <!-- add/edit--> <info type="ClusterVmGroup"> <name></name> <virtual-machine-list> <virtual-machine></virtual-machine> </virtual-machine-list> </info> </group-spec> </group-spec-list> </spec> <modify></modify> </parameters> </item> </items>
For description of each parameter tags, please refer "Construct Item for Update Cluster DRS Configuration" process.

connection parameters [optional] The XML containing the metadata needed by the adapter to connect to the target.
Value takes the form:
<connection-parameters> <soap-url></soap-url> <transport></transport> <user-name></user-name> <password></password> </connection-parameters>

output.description: The adapter response containing the results.

documentation.description: Update Cluster DRS Configuration Updates the DRS Configuration of the Cluster. DRS settings can be applied both at the cluster level and virtual machine level.
